description:
The autumn of arts. Kyoya is drawing something in his sketchbook. Mao thinks it is a monster, but actually...
Just before Halloween, the sisters invade the GJ Club room!! Apparently, they have formed a middle school GJ Club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Autumn of Arts, Appetite, and Attack
Geijutsu to Shokuyoku to Shuugeki no Aki
芸術と食欲と襲撃の秋
藝術, 食慾與襲擊之秋
